about_the_game:
Welcome to a parkour platformer game where you have to destroy fireballs that follow you across the levels and dodge other obstacles along the way! While you jump from each platform to reach the end you must shoot and destroy the voids launching the fireballs at you before losing three lives. This must be done in order to complete each level and section so you can escape from the demon who has held you hostage.

The 30 levels and 4 sections of this game includes multiple powerups, various enemies, different level designs, automatic progress saving, text & animation sequences, and unique sound effects which continuously get weirder as you progress.

All of the elements of this game must be utilized to reach the boss battle and escape from the place you've been held captive.

Will you be able to escape?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain mature themes, involving a monster capturing a boy who must destroy and avoid enemies to escape from captivity.
